name: document-scanning-system
description: 1. Install Node.js (v16+ recommended). 2. Clone this repository: `git clone <repo-url>` 3. Navigate to the project folder: `cd document-scanner` 4. Install dependencies: `npm install express sqlite3` 5. Create an `uploads/` folder: `mkdir uploads` 6. Start the server: `node server.js` 7. Open `http://localhost:3000` in your browser.
